com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj

Class LithoViewAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.LithoViewAssert

  • public class LithoViewAssert
extends <any>
    Assertion methods for LithoViews.

    To create an instance of this class, invoke assertThat(LithoView).

    Alternatively, use LithoAssertions which provides entry points to all Litho AssertJ helpers.
